dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: 눈 하나 깜짝 안 하다이/가 뭐예요?
dialogue.romanization: nun hana kkamjjak an hadai/ga mwoyeyo?
dialogue.translation: What is "눈 하나 깜짝 안 하다"?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: 눈 하나 깜짝 안 하다은/는 not bat an eye(이)에요.
dialogue.romanization: nun hana kkamjjak an hadaeun/neun not bat an eye(i)eyo.
dialogue.translation: "눈 하나 깜짝 안 하다" means "not bat an eye".
